job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on using AI as a tool to enhance software development productivity rather than building, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models themselves. It lacks specific technical details about AI model development or MLOps, making it lean towards a business or productivity enhancement role.

phrases: elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience
Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a focus on understanding market position, user satisfaction, and overall business goals, and driving AI integration to meet these objectives.

phrases: AI-First Software Engineer
elevating your coding skills to superhero status
conjuring code like magic
implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving
Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes
Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions
job_tasks.justification: The core of the role is described as software engineering, with AI being a 'co-pilot' or 'sidekick' to enhance coding and feature development.

phrases: tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development
curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons
Are you up for the challenge?
soft_skills.justification: The description emphasizes embracing new technologies and exploring new frontiers, indicating a need for adaptability and a willingness to learn.

phrases: predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge
delivering groundbreaking solutions
problem-solving
identify and resolve issues swiftly
soft_skills.justification: The role involves solving problems, delivering solutions, and proactively addressing issues, highlighting problem-solving abilities.

phrases: Think less routine, more innovation
pushing the boundaries of what's possible
crafting AI tools
innovative solutions
Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards
soft_skills.justification: The job description repeatedly stresses innovation, pushing boundaries, and driving new initiatives, aligning with an ownership and innovation mindset.
